about_the_game:
Welcome to the high speed boat racing world of Undertow!

The game features a physics based experience while still embodying that older arcade soul. Dive underwater and explore the undersea to find hidden items and shortcuts! Race around the many locations in Undertow and get the best times! Unlock new cups and body styles as you fight for the best time!

Training Map.
A great place to start! Only takes 1 minute and teaches all the fundamentals!

The Locations.
One second you're racing through the tropics enjoying that perfect sunset, the next you're deep in the swamps swatting away bugs. There's nothing like the mirror-like waters of a lake where there's no waves to challenge you, just your wits and the pedal to the metal!


The Gallery.
Unlock every boat and customize the paint jobs not just for you but for bragging rights!


Track Challenges.
Watch out for the Moving Pyramid's, Water Bombz, Spike Balls! Race as fast as you can to the finish line!


The game is always evolving, stay tuned for more updates as we go!

name: Undertow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

esrb.descriptors: This content is suitable for persons ages 6 and older.

short_description: Undertow is a high speed boat racer with an old arcade soul. Race in many locations like the arctic, jungles, forests, swamps for the best time. Customize your body style and paint job. Complete the MANY challenges Undertow has to offer. Question is, are you fast enough?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
